We are pleased to announce the release of NIMBLE version 1.2.1. This is a maintenance release that includes several important bug fixes and minor improvements.

## Bug Fixes

This release addresses several issues reported by users:

- Fixed compilation issues on certain Windows configurations
- Resolved memory allocation problems in specific MCMC scenarios
- Corrected behavior of user-defined distributions in edge cases
- Fixed issue with automatic differentiation in complex model structures

## Improvements

- Enhanced error messages for better debugging
- Improved performance in specific nimbleFunction operations
- Updated documentation with additional examples

## Installation

Install from CRAN:

```r
install.packages("nimble")
```

Or from our repository:

```r
install.packages("nimble", repos = "https://r-nimble.org", type = "source")
```

## Migration from 1.2.0

No breaking changes - this release is fully compatible with NIMBLE 1.2.0.

We recommend all users upgrade to this version for improved stability and performance.
